cover_letter_template.opening: I solo-built 6 production AI applications in 7 months, demonstrating both technical depth and execution speed. With 7 years of C-suite experience and 50K+ lines of code, I combine strategic thinking with hands-on engineering.
cover_letter_template.company_research: [Research company and insert 2-3 sentences about why you're excited about THEIR specific mission/product/approach]
cover_letter_template.relevant_experience: Most relevant to this role: [Pick 2-3 specific achievements that match their job description]
cover_letter_template.differentiation: What makes me different: I can demonstrate a working product immediately (try: wa.me/50766623757). Most candidates talk about what they can build - I show what I've already built.
cover_letter_template.call_to_action: I'd love to discuss how my combination of strategic experience and technical execution can help [Company] achieve [their specific goal]. Available for a call this week.

Best regards,
Elena Revicheva
wa.me/50766623757 | aipa@aideazz.xyz | aideazz.xyz

interview_questions_prep.tell_me_about_yourself: I'm an engineer and founder who combines strategic thinking with hands-on execution. Spent 7 years as Chief Legal Officer leading digital transformation, then taught myself full-stack development and built 6 production AI apps in 7 months. What excites me most is building products that solve real problems - like my WhatsApp AI assistant that's live today at wa.me/50766623757. I'm looking for a role where I can use both my strategic experience and technical skills to build AI products that help millions of people.
interview_questions_prep.why_this_company: [Research company thoroughly] I'm excited about [Company] because [specific reason 1] and [specific reason 2]. When I saw [specific product/feature], I immediately thought about how [specific technical approach]. Your focus on [their mission] aligns perfectly with my experience building products for underserved markets.
interview_questions_prep.biggest_achievement: Building 6 production AI applications in 7 months for under $15K - a 98% cost reduction vs the $950K traditional estimate. But beyond the metrics, I'm most proud that these are real, working products solving real problems. You can try one right now: wa.me/50766623757. It demonstrates what I call 'founder-mode engineering' - strategic thinking plus hands-on execution plus relentless shipping.
interview_questions_prep.technical_challenge: Integrating 8 different AI APIs with real-time voice processing was complex. The challenge was handling voice-to-text latency, API failures, and maintaining conversation context. I solved it by building a robust error handling system with fallbacks, implementing streaming responses, and creating a context management layer. The result is a production system that handles real-time voice conversations with 99%+ uptime.
interview_questions_prep.why_leave_current_role: I spent 7 years in C-suite roles and realized my passion is building products, not just strategizing about them. So I taught myself to code and built 6 apps in 7 months. Now I want to join a team where I can combine both skill sets - strategic thinking AND hands-on engineering - to build AI products that scale to millions of users.
interview_questions_prep.salary_expectations: I'm looking for $100-180K base plus equity, depending on the role and company stage. Given my unique combination of 7 years C-suite experience plus full-stack engineering skills, I believe this is fair market value. But I'm flexible for the right opportunity, especially if there's meaningful equity.

companies: No technical team or weak engineering culture

technical: Building AI products (not just using AI)
Modern tech stack (React, TypeScript, Python, AI APIs)
High impact work (millions of users potential)
